en.website_title: Government Website Registered with the Digital Government Agency
en.hero_description: We provide you with a comprehensive digital environment that enables you to follow races, participate in auctions, and register and manage your pigeons reliably and securely, from anywhere at any time
en.video_not_supported: Your browser does not support video playback
en.news_description: Follow the most prominent events, activities and races of the Saudi Association
en.news_content: The Riyadh Racing Pigeon Championship was held on Friday morning with the participation of more than 300 competitors from different regions of the Kingdom, and witnessed strong competition and enthusiastic atmosphere.
en.name_must_be_three_words: Name Must be in Three words
en.name_must_be_two_words: Name Must be in Two words
en.national_id_min_length: National ID must be in Ten numbers
en.national_id_must_be_10_digits: National ID must be in Ten numbers
en.national_id_saudi_must_start_1: National ID of Saudi must start with 1
en.national_id_non_saudi_must_start_2: National ID of Not Saudi must start with 2
en.annual_reports_description: View the official annual reports issued by the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee, which include achievements, statistics, and approved activities
en.annual_report_description_short: View the official annual reports issued by the Saudi Committee
en.directors_description: The Board of Directors supervises the platform and leads development strategies for pigeon racing events
en.director_position: Chairman of the Board of Directors
en.director_bio: With over 15 years of experience in managing sports associations and developing projects.
en.racing_schedule_description: Follow the schedule of races and be the first to know the upcoming challenges in the cities of the Kingdom.
en.membership_description: Submit your electronic request to issue an official membership or license approved by the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee.
en.license_description: Issue an approved license to participate in official championships and races, according to the approved regulations and rules of the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee
en.membership_card_description: Issue an official membership for individuals or clubs, allowing you to benefit from all approved services of the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee
en.auctions_description: Browse the most prominent ongoing auctions and start bidding on the best breeds.
en.auction_description: A distinguished auction featuring elite racing pigeons known for their speed and accuracy in races, and your opportunity to acquire birds with strong breeds and professional performance.
en.community_description: A unified platform bringing clubs and pigeon enthusiasts together in one place
en.unions_and_partners_description: A wide network of relationships with local and international federations to promote the sport of pigeon racing
en.footer_copyright_title: All rights reserved to the Digital Government Committee ยฉ 2024
en.footer_copyright_by: Developed and designed by AAIT Platform
en.license_hero_description: Issue an approved license to participate in official championships and races, according to the approved regulations and rules of the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee
en.welcome_desc: Welcome back, welcome to the pigeon racing management system.
en.verify: Enter the verification code sent to your phone
en.verify_subtitle_part1: A 4-digit code has been sent to your phone number:
en.verify_subtitle_part2: Enter the code to complete verification.
en.verify_code_numbers_only: Verification code must contain only numbers
en.phone_numbers_only: Phone number must contain only numbers
en.phone_min_length: Phone number must be at least 9 digits long
en.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
en.Forgot_Password_subtitle: No problem, enter your phone number associated with the account and we will send you a confirmation code to reset your password
en.reset_password_subtitle: Enter a strong password containing letters, numbers and symbols
en.license_request_subtitle: Please fill in all required fields accurately
en.full_name_min_length: Name must be at least 3 characters
en.national_id_numbers_only: National ID must contain only numbers
en.required_documents_desc: Please upload all required documents in clear format
en.personal_photo_desc: Click and choose file from here or drop it here
en.fitness_certificate_desc: Click and choose file from here or drop it here
en.club_approval_desc: Click and choose file from here or drop it here
en.file_too_large: File size should be less than 5MB
en.invalid_file_type: Unsupported file type. Please upload PDF or image file
en.contact_subtitle: Track your previous complaints and know their current status easily
en.message_min_length: Message must be at least 10 characters
en.name_min_length: Name must be at least 3 characters
en.stay_in_touch_subtitle: Our team is ready to answer your inquiries and support you at any time, contact us
en.address_details: 3620 King Abdullah Branch Road, Al Malqa 6414
en.auctions_hero_title: The official auction platform for racing pigeons in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
en.auctions_hero_description: Under the supervision of trusted authorities, we offer certified pigeon auctions adhering to the highest standards of integrity and transparency. Enjoy a secure bidding experience, with detailed information for each auction, documented records for the pigeons, and guaranteed rights for all participants.
en.auction_terms_agreement: I agree to the terms and conditions
en.license_hero_description_2: Submit your electronic request to issue an approved license or membership to participate in races and championships according to the approved regulations of the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee
en.national_id_desc: Click and choose file from here or drop it here
en.news_hero_title: Your Platform for the Latest Racing Pigeon News
en.news_hero_description: Follow all the latest events, results, and announcements from the Saudi Association directly through our platform and stay informed about the latest races, events, and official announcements from the Association
en.clubs_hero_title: Clubs Participating in Racing Pigeon Competitions
en.clubs_hero_description: Our platform brings together the most prominent accredited clubs interested in the sport of racing pigeons in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Explore the list of clubs, learn about their activities, and participate in the growing pigeon racing community
en.racing_schedule_description2: Explore the complete schedule of upcoming championships, where wings compete in the Kingdom's skies for the honor of launch and leadership. Learn about the dates and locations of racing pigeon championships in various regions of the Kingdom
en.membership_card_description_2: Submit your electronic request to obtain an accredited membership in the Saudi Racing Pigeon Committee, and enjoy the official benefits for participants and enthusiasts according to the regulatory guidelines.
en.Subscribe_req_success: Your subscription request has been sent successfully
en.championship_sample_description: The Riyadh Annual Racing Pigeon Championship was held this morning with the participation of over 300 competitors from various regions of the Kingdom, amid a distinguished public attendance reflecting the growing popularity of this ancient sport in Saudi society.
en.championship_sample_content_1: The championship was launched in ideal weather conditions suitable for pigeons, with wide-scale participation, where competitors demonstrated their expertise in training and breeding pigeons, which was reflected in good return times proportional to race distances, indicating the advanced level this sport has reached in the Kingdom.
en.championship_sample_content_2: The championship was distinguished by strict organization and enthusiastic atmosphere, where the organizing committee provided all necessary facilities for competitors and attendees. An advanced electronic tracking system was also provided to follow the race progress moment by moment, adding a modern technical dimension to the event.
en.championships_title2: Follow the most prominent events, activities and races of the Saudi Racing Pigeon Association first hand
en.championships_desc: Browse the latest championships and events for racing pigeon sports in various regions of the Kingdom. We monitor race details, schedules, and results for you
en.bids_will_appear: All bids will appear here when bidding starts
en.club_sample_description: Jeddah Pigeon Racing Club is one of the accredited clubs in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for pigeon racing sports. The club has represented several official long-distance races and participates in events organized under the supervision of the Saudi Pigeon Racing Committee. For example: announcing its result for a distance of 715 km in the 2024-2025 season.
en.club_sample_goal_1: Organizing and participating in long and medium distance pigeon races.
en.club_sample_goal_2: Working within an official system supervised by the Saudi Committee for Sports Development
en.club_sample_goal_3: Raising the level of professionalism in this sport and achieving clear results shown in race announcements.
en.club_about_title: What is Jeddah Pigeon Racing Club
en.my_auction_title: Track all your requests easily and in one place
en.my_auction_desc: View the status of your requests for services and auctions in real-time, and follow all updates regarding approvals, reviews, and ongoing procedures. All your requests... under monitoring!
en.wallet_description: Take control of your deposits, withdrawals, and rewards for your participation.
en.wallet_charge_message: Top up your balance and use it easily whenever you need it ๐ฐ
en.share_complaint_image: Share an image for the complaint
en.order_accepted_message: Your order has been accepted. Please complete the payment process within the specified period to avoid automatic cancellation
en.order_finished_message: Your order has been completed successfully ๐ Please confirm receipt. If not confirmed within the specified period, it will be automatically considered received by the administration
en.order_cancelled_message: Your order has been cancelled due to non-payment within the specified time
en.complaint_sent_successfully: Your complaint has been sent successfully
en.my_complaints_desc: Track your previous complaints and know their current status easily
en.under_review_message: Under review, you will receive a response upon completion
en.register_subtitle: Create your club account to start managing members, birds, and races via the approved platform.
en.terms_modal_content: By participating in this auction, I acknowledge and agree to all the terms and conditions governing it, and I pledge that all bids I make through the platform are binding and I may not withdraw them after registration. I also commit to paying the final auction value if I win within the period specified by the administration, and I know that non-compliance may result in the cancellation of the win and the transfer of the right to another bidder. I also agree that all bidding will be done electronically through the platform in accordance with approved controls to ensure transparency and protect the rights of all participants
en.accept_terms_button: I Agree to Terms and Conditions
